		\begin{tasks}
			\task \Mq $\forall n \in \NN, \lfloor ( \sqrt{n} + \sqrt{n+1})^2 \rfloor = 4n +1$.
 			\task \Mq  $\forall x \in \RR, x \ge 0 \Rightarrow \lfloor \sqrt{\lfloor x \rfloor}\rfloor = \lfloor \sqrt{x} \rfloor$.
 	\end{tasks}
